overview:
Nathaniel joined Imaginova in 2007 and is responsible for overseeing the consumer media division including all editorial, design, product development and engineering.

Prior to joining the company, Nathaniel was the Webmaster and Lead Information Architect for Arch Insurance Group where he directed all Web development initiatives. Previously, he served as Director of Customer Experience at LiveAdvice.com, Vice President of Production at Braindock.com and Product Manager at About.com.

Nate graduated from Vassar College with a bachelor’s degree in Sociology and History.
